sentences.english: Different Christian sects have divided the list of commandments up differently.
sentences.chinese: 不同的基督宗教派別有各自不同的十誡。

sentences.english: What is the sum of the ten commandments?
There is a sense in which the entire Decalogue was limited to the covenant community only.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，整個十誡是隻限於聖約羣體的。

sentences.english: His face be fille with break commandment .
sentences.chinese: 他臉上劃滿了破破爛爛的十誡。

sentences.english: When I came down, the Ten Commandments had been written on the tablets.
sentences.chinese: 當我下山的時候，十誡已經被寫在了石版上面。

sentences.english: Sinai and got the Ten Commandments or Laws on two tablets of Stone.
sentences.chinese: 摩西上西乃山從神那裏領受刻在石版上的十誡或律法。

sentences.english: That place is the Ten Commandments, found in Exodus 20.
sentences.chinese: 這個地方就是聖經十誡，出自《出埃及記》第20章。

sentences.english: Moses went up Mount Sinai and got the Ten Commandments or Laws on two tablets of Stone.
sentences.chinese: 摩西上西乃山從神那裏領受刻在石版上的十誡或律法。

sentences.english: Rest is so important, in fact, that God put it in the Ten Commandments.
sentences.chinese: 休息是如此的重要因而事實上上帝將之放入了十誡中。

sentences.english: Bellick:Good, 'cause the Ten Commandments don't mean a box of piss in here.
sentences.chinese: 那就好，因爲十誡在這屁用沒有。

sentences.english: Many people see the Ten Commandments merely as rules that govern our behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 在很多人的眼中，十誡只是一些規條。

sentences.english: His face is fille with break commandment.
sentences.chinese: 他臉上劃滿了破破爛爛的十誡。

sentences.english: And he wrote on the tablets the words of the covenant-the Ten Commandments.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華將這約的話，就是十誡，寫在兩塊版上。

definition: the Last Supper (in the biblical Passion story)
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
the Revelation of St John the divine/the Apocalypse
